original_title: Presidential Election: Voter turnout as at 2pm
original_body_lines: The district-level voter turnout percentages for the 2024 Presidential Election as at 2.00 p.m. today have been reported with several districts already seeing a turnout of over 60 percent.
Accordingly, the voter turnout percentages of several districts as at 2.00 p.m. today (21) are as follows:
Voting for the presidential election commenced at 7.00 a.m. this morning at 13,421 polling stations across the island and will continue until 4.00 p.m.
